author: skkwan
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements the firmware-based Phase 2 EGamma standalone barrel emulator. The output collections are of the same data type as the TDR (previous version) non-firmware-based Phase 2 emulator, namely l1t::EGamma, l1tp2::CaloCrystalClusters, and 1tp2::CaloTower. 

Some firmware-style code is refacored into abstracted functions and classes, compared to the firmware. 

This PR also corresponds to [PR#1069 to cms-l1t-offline](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1069). 

#### PR validation:

Efficiencies and rates for the EG clusters produced in the firmware-based emulator are [compared](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1069#issuecomment-1479547259) with the previous TDR emulator. 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: implement fw-based Phase2 EG standalone barrel
